### bloCkchAin ciphEr'S sERcret
```
My friend, you know...
There're tooooo many of those GPTable Crypto Challenges and Baby Crypto stuffs...
So I implemented a baby one on blockchain!
Sepolia test net, address: 0x9C71c90140162a5BAE7159Ec5CC4C86FAddCBfb6
```

https://sepolia.etherscan.io/address/0x9C71c90140162a5BAE7159Ec5CC4C86FAddCBfb6


```py
def extract_flag_from_bytecode(bytecode: str) -> str:
    import re
    hex_match = re.search(r'7f([0-9a-f]{64})', bytecode)
    if not hex_match:
        raise ValueError("No PUSH32-style flag found in bytecode.")
    
    hex_flag = hex_match.group(1)
    ascii_flag = bytes.fromhex(hex_flag).decode()
    return ascii_flag

def caesar_decrypt(text: str, shift: int = -7) -> str:
    def shift_char(c):
        if 'a' <= c <= 'z':
            return chr((ord(c) - ord('a') + shift) % 26 + ord('a'))
        elif 'A' <= c <= 'Z':
            return chr((ord(c) - ord('A') + shift) % 26 + ord('A'))
        else:
            return c
    return ''.join(shift_char(c) for c in text)

if __name__ == "__main__":

    raw_flag = extract_flag_from_bytecode(bytecode.lower())
    decrypted_inner = caesar_decrypt(raw_flag[5:-1])
    final_flag = raw_flag[:5] + decrypted_inner + raw_flag[-1]

    print("[+] Raw flag:     ", raw_flag)
    print("[+] Decrypted:    ", final_flag)
```
